sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix"> <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <before>false</before> <description>To change reference for column installed_on from cmdb_ci_hardware to cmdb_ci.</description> <name>Change installed_on reference to cmdb_ci</name> <record_for_rollback>true</record_for_rollback> <script><![CDATA[(function() { var script = 'new global.SAMModelUtil().changeInstalledOnReference();'; GlideRunScriptJob.scheduleScript(script); }());]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_fix</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-07-26 15:48:18</sys_created_on> <sys_id>1b64987b77341110e1a656387d5a9985</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Change installed_on reference to cmdb_ci</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="">311f72f347213110020ba9f8536d43dc</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_fix_1b64987b77341110e1a656387d5a9985</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-07-26 15:48:18</sys_updated_on> <unloadable>false</unloadable> </sys_script_fix> </record_update>
